name: Baki Hanma x AIR SMOKE ZERO

metadata.name: Baki Hanma X AIR SMOKE ZERO #1
metadata.description:
Baki Hanma×AIR SMOKE ZERO

The collaborated virtual sneakers express the main characters, their fighting scenes, and other remarkable scenes. All of the sneakers will be minted as an NFT, which means each one is one of a kind.

©︎Keisuke Itagaki(AKITASHOTEN)/Baki Hanma Film Partners
